articles.description: Peta Murgatroyd is speaking out after having an emotional reunion with her husband, "Dancing with the Stars" alum Maksim Chmerkovskiy, following his return home from Ukraine. Murgatroyd said that the couple is "continuing" their "efforts to provide assistance…
articles.content:

articles.title: Bolshoi Theatre's chief conductor quits after pressure to condemn Ukraine invasion - Reuters.com
articles.description: Tugan Sokhiev, the chief conductor at Moscow's prestigious Bolshoi Theatre, announced on Sunday he was quitting his job after coming under pressure to condemn the Russian invasion of Ukraine.
articles.content: OTTAWA, March 6 (Reuters) - Tugan Sokhiev, the chief conductor at Moscow's prestigious Bolshoi Theatre, announced on Sunday he was quitting his job after coming under pressure to condemn the Russian … [+888 chars]

articles.title: ‘The Bachelor’ Meets ‘Bridgerton?’ Why NBC Is Betting on the Regency Era For Its Modern Dating Show - Variety
